TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 承载一个 对象集合。

span.span: Hosts a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是特殊的类型的类用于对逻辑上承载的单元格指示二进制状态。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that indicate binary state. A都有一个相关中每个与其相交。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 每个单元格都提供类似于的用户界面 (UI)控件。Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a control. 此列类型的默认排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . 通常情况下，复选框单元格值旨在用于存储，如任何其他数据，或执行大容量操作。Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations. 如果你想要立即当用户单击复选框单元格，你可以处理响应事件，但此事件发生之前更新单元格的值。If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated. 如果在单击时需要的新值，一个选项是计算所需的值将是基于当前值。If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value. 另一种方法是立即提交更改并处理事件以对其做出响应。Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the event to respond to it. 若要在单击单元格时，请提交更改，你必须处理事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格，复选框单元格调用方法并传入值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用标记哪些员工不在办公室。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to mark which employees are out of the office. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 你还应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 将 类的新实例初始化为默认状态。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to the default state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此默认构造函数和提供的自变量是等效`false`到构造函数。Using this default constructor is equivalent to supplying an argument of `false` to the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool threeState) cil managed

param.name: threeState
param.span: 如果为 ，则显示具有三种状态的复选框；如果为 ，则显示具有两种状态的复选框。

span.span: to display check boxes with three states; to display check boxes with two states.

summary.span: 初始化 的新实例并将其配置为显示具有两种或三种状态的复选框。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the and configures it to display check boxes with two or three states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化通过设置以下属性的列。This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||一个新与其属性初始化为`threeState`参数值。A new with its property initialized to the `threeState` parameter value.| ||`threeState` 参数的值。The value of the `threeState` parameter.| ||| |属性返回对象属性。The property of the object returned by the property.|| |属性返回对象属性。The property of the object returned by the property.|如果 为 `threeState`，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。 if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell CellTemplate { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property CellTemplate As DataGridViewCell
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ CellTemplate { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
The default value is a new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类初始化该属性为新创建。The constructors for the class initialize this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列的现有单元格的用户的界面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 重新生成列后，这些更改才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用标记哪些员工不在办公室。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to mark which employees are out of the office. 单元格模板用于将相同的颜色应用于复选框列中的所有单元格。The cell template is used to apply the same color to all cells in the check box column. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值返回此属性具有以下的初始属性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 属性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|默认值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| ||| || 如果初始属性值是`true`; 否则为`false`。 if the initial property value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.| 这些值重写中指定的值属性控件，但可能由其他单元格样式属性重写。These values override the value specified in the property of the control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如果属性返回的对象属性具有的值`false`、 变化属性值设置为`true`自动设置到。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value of `false`, changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to . 如果的值为、 变化属性值设置为`false`自动设置到`false`。If has a value of , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ FalseValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对应于 单元格值（显示为取消选中的复选框）的基础值。

span.span: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of , which appears as an unchecked box.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示将被此列中的单元格视为 值的一个值。

span.span: An representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as a value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性确定这些状态相关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的单元格对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将与相关联"turnedOff" `false`、属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性将相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

span.span: The value of the property is .

summary.span: 获取或设置复选框单元格的平面样式外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the check box cells.

value.span: 指示列中单元格外观的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the appearance of cells in the column.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要显示使用视觉样式的复选框单元格，请将此属性设置为并调用方法，然后再。To display the check box cells using visual styles, set this property to and call the method before . 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的单元格对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用标记哪些员工不在办公室。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to mark which employees are out of the office. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ IndeterminateValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对应于不确定或 单元格值（显示为禁用复选框）的基础值。

span.span: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.

value.span: 一个 ，表示将被此列中单元格视为不确定值的一个值。

span.span: An representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as an indeterminate value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性确定这些状态相关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的单元格对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将与相关联"turnedOff" `false`、属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性将相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ThreeState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此寄宿的复选框单元格是否允许三种复选状态而不是两种。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.

value.span: 如果寄宿的 对象能够具有第三种（即不确定）状态，则值为 ；否则值为 。

span.span: if the hosted objects are able to have a third, indeterminate, state; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不确定状态非常有用，例如，如果您不想在复选框中设置默认值。The indeterminate state can be useful, for example, when you do not want to set a default value in the check box. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的单元格对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 如果属性返回的对象属性具有的值`false`、 变化属性值设置为`true`自动设置到。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value of `false`, changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to . 如果的值为、 变化属性值设置为`false`自动设置到`false`。If has a value of , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将与相关联"turnedOff" `false`、属性将与相关联"turnedOn" `true`，和属性将相关联"未知"的不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]
